name: Sense of Direction
description:
Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #10 with the theme of 'Direction'.

Following the theme this game is about a person's sense of direction, their ability  to know their location and find a path to their goal. This is game is a maze designed to mess with your sense of direction and leave you disoriented. While dealing with your limited visibility, teleports, and traps you race to the exit to compete for the best time.

To help you find your way you can light up torches scattered around the maze to give you visibility in an area around them and you can press 'r' to place a sign on the ground to help you remember what paths are dead ends, places you haven't checked, etc. 

There are two levels of difficulty both with a separate scoreboard.
